Author of Shore Line Recall: Boston Harbor Islands
http://freedombaird.org/

I'm a Boston-area interdisciplinary artist making work to answer questions, which usually generates more questions. MIT and MassArt trained. Committed to the human-nature connection. Mom of two college students (they vote!). Walker of Teddy the dog in State Parks. Covid in March 2020 left me with a chronic heart condition, but I'm otherwise alright. For real.

Happy to be here on Mastodon!
